mainHero.title: Green Day
mainHero.subtitle: RecycleMe Global
mainHero.description: Heyヾ(≧▽≦*)o Welcome to our website for a new Green Day. Scroll down for the introduction of this project or Click the menu above to start your journey!

items.title: Our Motivation
items.description:
Have you ever experienced that you would like to recycle your stuff but cannot find the correct place for it? We did.
With this application and platform, our goal is simple: offering you enough information with minimal effort to finish your recycling. We hope this will ease the difficulty of recycling in daily lives and encourage more people to join in recycling.

items.title: Check Out the Phone App: RecycleMe USA
items.description: We have a phone app for this! It is extremely convenient for users to take pictures, identify the recycling type of your item, and find the nearest place to put it. Check it out now in Google Play.

items.title: With Google
items.description: As the main provider for the technologies we are using, Google is diligent in making the world and the environment around us a better place. At Google, people remain committed to sustainability and continue to lead and encourage others to join in improving the health of our planet.

items.title: Contribute to Your Community
items.description: Here is your opportunity! We manage our database dynamically, so there is a good chance for your pictures to be shown to all people in your district. Open our app now and take your first recycling picture :D

items.name: Google Maps
items.description: Map and Geocoding are our friends during the implementation. By making use of their strong functionalities, we manage to visually display the positions of recycling centers and trash cans, and keep all user updates aligning closely for our database’s self-sustainability.

items.name: Firebase & Firestore
items.description: Here comes our database for informational data. Firebase brings all your data absolutely portable, so be sure to log in to your account and enjoy this platform everywhere. We also speed up the search function with the help of Firestore.

items.name: Google Cloud
items.description: Cloud Run, Cloud Vision, Cloud Storage, and more! All our machine learning models and all the user pictures are here.

items.name: React
items.description: Declarative, Efficient, and Flexible. We use React Native for the phone app and Next.js for the website.
